captions.text: Sorry, man.
Ow. Ow. Ow.

<i>(grunts in</i>
<i>stifled anger)</i>

<i>This is your fault,</i>
<i>you limey fuck!</i>

<i>You shit the money-bed,</i>
<i>my friend.</i>

But I am dealing with
a bunch of prima donnas!
Clowns!

Tugg speedman,
he can't cry!
He can't cry!

<i>You pull down their pants</i>
<i>and you spank their ass.</i>

You spank
that ass, les.
What?

Spanking a child
turns him into
a little snot.
Fear makes him a man.

I know a place
where a man's
worth is measured

In the ears hanging
from his dog tags.
The real deep shit.

You wanna make
this movie right?

That's where you take
your pansy-ass actors.
<i>Who is this guy?</i>
Les, that's four leaf.

Sergeant
four leaf tayback.
I wrote the book.
<i>Oh.</i>
<i>You're a great american.</i>

<i>This nation owes you</i>
<i>a huge debt.</i>

<i>Now shut the fuck up</i>
<i>and let me do my job!</i>

<i>Look, cockburn.</i>
<i>Yes.</i>

<i>That every time</i>
<i>you have a thought,</i>

<i>It's gonna have to tiptoe</i>
<i>past my wedding ring.</i>

<i>Take control of your actors,</i>
<i>or I will shut you down.</i>
<i>Diet coke!</i>
